Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera .... Poor Accessories
Reviews.Author: yousuf
Reviews.Content: The whole package was delivered on time as notified at the time of purchase. It also had all the accessories neatly packed. However, only the camera, 18-55mm and 75-300mm, spare battery are canon owned products. Rest accessories were NOT! The bag is noticeably small and can only hold camera and 18-55 mm lens. The wide angle and 2X lens are not CANON products either. This was very disappointing for me. Although, all the products are brand new and work flawlessly. The deal would've been sweeter if the rest accessories were cannon made too.

Reviews.Title: Great starter kit...Bigger bag would be useful.
Reviews.Author: jeffi7d2
Reviews.Content: Although all the products in this package are NOT Canon products the overall quality is great.  Everything came as advertised and was very neatly packed in the box I received.  The only issue I had (more like a suggestion or thought) was that the bag that came with it is not big enough for all the pieces included in this package.  Maybe a future upgrade in bag sizes available for this package is in the works.  Yet overall the accessories bag still allows you to carry around the basics.  Did like that it came with an extra battery and charger (car charger is a great thing to have on a camping trip where elertrical outlets are not readily available).  From a cost standpoint though this package is a great starter kit for that photographer in your life.  I know my daughter will be enjoying this gift for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and quality
Reviews.Author: David S. Shores
Reviews.Content: This camera is well worth the monies I spent as my wife is a photographer and this camera takes shots that it should not be able to take as they look professional!!!

Reviews.Title: Well Worth the Money I spent!!!
Reviews.Author: Melinda D.
Reviews.Content: I got this camera bundle at tax time and I dont regret it one bit You get a long lens and a short lens, a 2x lens and a macro lens for up close pictures. I wasnt very "camera" savvy used to point and shoot cameras but this is simple to use and I have used it aAT LEAST 2 times a week. My kids are tired of picture taking but I am just getting started..lolThe only thing I wpu;d add to make this bundle even better would be a photo editing software bundled with it (  but I just got one so I am now good :)  )If you are on the fence I would WHOLEHEARTEDLY say take the jump. I am sooooooooooo glad I did

Reviews.Title: camera works great
Reviews.Author: Richard Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: the camera took good pictures the first 2 times we used it, we recommend the camera for anyone wanting a new camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Debra k
Reviews.Content: We are so happy that we decided to upgrade to the Cannon T3 EOS camera. Our boys are involved in baseball and crew(rowing). This camera takes great action shoots. And still shots. I would recommend this camera to anyone wanting to upgrade from a regular digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Claudia Valle
Reviews.Content: So far, I love the package I received. Everything arrived as stated in the ad. Camera is great- and it really is a great deal with ALL the things you get!

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Package
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my wife. She said that she wanted to get into photography.Since I gave her the camera she must have taken several thousand pictures, and absolutely loves the camera.The only negative is the card reader that comes with the package. Every time she uses it corrupts the data on the SD card. luckily her laptop has a card reader built into it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I wish I had not waited so long to switch from film. I love this camera and the 70/300 MM lens. The travel charger box and contents were not the same, but 1 phone call and 3 days had the correct one at my door. I have used everything that came with the package. It is really nice to have two batteries and chargers. I had never used a card reader but it is so much faster and easier than plugging in the camera. If you buy this don't buy it for the camera bag (it is way too small I'm using my old one). And I just can not trust either of the tripods especialy with the 300mm lens (I'm using my old one). For the price this was the best deal I could find. And the service was great. My suggestion would be to lose the tripods and up grade the bag! Great camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Service that exceed expectations
Reviews.Author: Mohamed Abdou
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to receive all items in a timely manner, everything sealed and brand new. It was a good offer to have all these items in this package for this price.

Reviews.Title: My first DSLR and well worth it
Reviews.Author: dpal123
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera. I got the whole package beacuse I could afford the reasonable price and it came with a lot of extras that come handy while traveling. Obviously, this is a big step up from my Canon A700 point-n-shoot in terms of picture quality, shooting modes and the flash that makes night-shots very clear. I loved the fact that it came with an extra battery pack and an USB adapter for direct read from the memory card.I am not an expert photographer, but the kind of shots I got so far tells me I may not buy another one in a long time! I have stuck with Canon over the years for their quality. Now, I am off to vacations world!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: tumbleweedred
Reviews.Content: i do like the camera and all the accessories I just have to learn how to use it to its capacity

Reviews.Title: Good camera with some conerns about the peripherals, but in the end overall good value.
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Sumner
Reviews.Content: Overall this was a reasonably good package.  The T3 and two major IS lens are great and better than my older XT.  However, the periferal components, ie filters, macro & 2x screw on lens don't seem to be of the best quality.  The carry case provided is not big enough to hold all of the items sold in this package.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: emg
Reviews.Content: This was a huge value! Only thing that could make it better is getting a large enough camera case to hold of the accessories.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Shayla Hudson
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera and all the stuff that came with it!!!  It was worth every penny I paid!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ljcammy
Reviews.Content: I got everything that was said to be there and works great. I would buy again from this company with out a doubt.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with small bag
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Got it yesterday - on time. Everything in one package.  Took great photos.  Two things I do not like Immediately  One is that most of lens and covers are not from Canon.  Secondly, the camera bag is so small, it only fits in camera body with one lens.  It is like most beautiful picture in an ugly and cheap frame.  I ordered another camera bag.  I will review the camera once we use it more.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 camera and kit
Reviews.Author: Gregory Vollmer
Reviews.Content: Great camera and good shipping/packaging.  Everything received as described. Quality of pictures excellent.  Zipper on camera bag broke during first use

Reviews.Title: Best Canon For the price
Reviews.Author: Deborah LeFever
Reviews.Content: First time buyer on amazon. Was very pleased with everything that came with camera. Easy to use and came with great book on different ways to take pictures. Easy to understand. Amazon was great on letting me know step by step from time of order till delivery were my camera was. The company did a great job on getting my order right, packing it, and getting it to me before delivery date. I will order from that company again. The only problem I had was with UPS. I left a note on the door to take packages to another location if I was not at home. You guessed it when I came home the box was sitting infront of the door with the note on it. It was left out in the open with no protection and were anyone could see it from the road. I don't blame the company that sent it but something that cost that much you should have to sign for it.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS HD Movie mode with expanded recording and with in-camera video editing options.
High speed, reliable 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/5.6 cross-type center point.
Includes EOS Rebel T3 digital SLR camera and EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II Lens+Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens; 12 megapixel CMOS sensor; Eye-level SLR viewfinder
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens (Black) + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory + Extra LPE10 Battery/Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + Full Size Tripod + Accessory Kit
